definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Enemy agents plotted to blow up the plant.
sentences.chinese: 敌人奸细密谋炸毁那家工厂。

sentences.english: All the camouflage of the spies cannot escape his sharp eyes.
sentences.chinese: 奸细所有的伪饰都逃不过他锐利的眼睛。

sentences.english: Judas wearing black cockscomb had hidden himself in the shaded volutes of an Ionic column.
sentences.chinese: 一个戴黑帽子的奸细站在爱奥尼柱涡卷的阴影中。

sentences.english: The spy wormed in the meeting-place.
Friend bin, misunderstanding spies is the beauty, and he split.
sentences.chinese: 朋琨误解奸细是保美，与他分裂。

sentences.english: The spy wormed the true story out of a boy.
sentences.chinese: 奸细从一个男孩那里套出了实情。

sentences.english: The enemy employed a red-hvastcasted siren as a spy.
sentences.chinese: 仇敌雇用了一名红发美女作奸细。

sentences.english: Don't tell him anything, he's a Yankee spy.
sentences.chinese: 什么也不要告诉他，他是个北佬的奸细。

sentences.english: It never occurred to me that she was a spy.
sentences.chinese: 我从来没有想到她是一名奸细。

definition: undiscovered traitor/enemy within one's own ranks
intelligence gatherer/spy/detective/scout/sound (medical instrument)/long and narrow probing and sampling utensil
to betray one's party/to defect (from the communist party)/renegade faction
remaining evil element/surviving members (of evil former regime)/dregs (of colonial administration)
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
